biogHist.abstract: The Community History Images Collection is an online collection of historical images. The collecion is part of the Community History Library which is a section of the The Grove Library. The collection includes photos of people, places and events in Cottesloe, Mosman Park and Peppermint Grove from the 1890's to the present day. As at 2015 the collection includes 2000 images but it is continually being added to by donations. The collection includes photos of Chidley Education Centre, Greenplace, Independent Order of Oddfellows' Orphanage, WA School for Deaf Children and the Salvation Army Girls' Home, Cottesloe.
biogHist.p: The collection is available online. The copyright varies for each photo, please check the information below the specific image for any copyright information.

resourceRelation.relationEntry: 'Community History Images Collection', in Find & Connect - Western Australia,
Kia Ora, Salvation Army Home for Girls

archref.repository: Community History Images Collection, The Grove Library
archref.unittitle: Kia Ora, Salvation Army Home for Girls
archref.abstract: This is a digital copy of an image showing Kia Ora, one of the two buildings that were part of the Salvation Army Home for Girls. It is thought that the photo was taken in the 1960s. This image is part of the The Grove Library's Community History Images Collection.

resourceRelation.relationEntry: Dawn Martell and Marlene Robinson in front of Byanda, 1962

archref.repository: Community History Images Collection, The Grove Library
archref.unittitle: Dawn Martell and Marlene Robinson in front of Byanda, 1962
archref.abstract: This is a digital copy of a photograph that shows two girls on the netball court in front of Byanda, one of the two buildings that were part of the Salvation Army Home for Girls. This image is part of the The Grove Library's Community History Images Collection.

archref.repository: Community History Images Collection, The Grove Library, Community History Images Collection
archref.abstract: This is a copy of a digital image of the Independent Order of Oddfellows' Orphanage and children, around 1910. It is from the Marchant James collection and is included in the online Community History Images Collection held by The Grove Library.

resourceRelation.relationEntry: Green Place on the Swan River, Mosman Park

archref.repository: Community History Images Collection, The Grove Library
archref.unittitle: Green Place on the Swan River, Mosman Park
archref.abstract: This is a digital copy of a photograph which shows the outside of the Greenplace Hostel as it would have looked in the 1920s. This image is part of the The Grove Library's Community History Images Collection.

archref.repository: Community History Images Collection, The Grove Library
archref.abstract: This is a digital copy of a photograph of the Chidley Educational Centre in Owston Street, Mosman Park. This image is part of the The Grove Library's Community History Images Collection.

resourceRelation.relationEntry: Chidley Educational Centre, Owston Street, Mosman Park

archref.repository: Community History Images Collection, The Grove Library
archref.unittitle: Chidley Educational Centre, Owston Street, Mosman Park
archref.abstract: This is a digital copy of a photograph of the front entrance of the Chidley Educational Centre in Mosman Park. This image is part of the The Grove Library's Community History Images Collection.
